title: Sister O'dell, Bill Cosby, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Bill Cosby, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CEO is broadcasting live from South Africa. Today is the first day of taping for Family Feud in The Motherland. It is officially 13 days from Christmas. Are you ready? Sister O'dell is here is wish us Happy Holidays and more. Bill Cosby's appeal is denied. A runaway was found living in a Bed Bath and Beyond. Sheryl Underwood stopped by to discuss her dates, Trump's impeachment and her special Christmas gift just for Junior. Miss Carla's Reality Update involves wigs, strip clubs and Cabo San Lucas (RHOA). If you could live in and out of a particular store, what would it be and why? Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about our dreams and their importance, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
